entities.name: norris
entities.description: Norris is a person who was prowling the second floor. He is mentioned as being present in the scene.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who was bouncing around the trophy room. He is mentioned as being currently active and causing trouble.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person whose eyes are traveling up and down the familiar corridors. He is the main character of the scene.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a person who is tracing one of the passages on the map with his finger. He is mentioned as being knowledgeable about the secret passages.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who knows about four of the secret passages. He is mentioned as being aware of their existence.

relationships.description: Harry's eyes are traveling up and down the familiar corridors where Norris was prowling.
Fred is tracing one of the passages on the map with his finger.
Filch knows about four of the secret passages.
